name: schedule(after:interval:tolerance:options:_:)
desc: Performs the action at some time after the specified date, at the specified frequency, optionally taking into account tolerance if possible.Required.
declaration: func schedule(after date: Self.SchedulerTimeType, interval: Self.SchedulerTimeType.Stride, tolerance: Self.SchedulerTimeType.Stride, options: Self.SchedulerOptions?, _ action: @escaping () -> Void) -> Cancellable
